column1: Casuarius casuarius;Southern Cassowary;The cassowary is a mysterious loner and one of the most dangerous and aggressive flightless birds. Due to the displayed great timidity
column2: it is more common to hear the bird's voice in the wild than to see it. The cassowary territories are located near water reservoirs. These birds show many surprising features: they are excellent swimmers
column4: and in emergency situations they can jump up to 1.5 m.;https://www.iucnredlist.org/species/22678108/131902050
